notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Konten blong yu bambae i kam anonim long 7 dei from
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Olgeta konten blong yu long komuniti ia bambae i kam anonim mo i stap long aekaev long 7 dei, afta long hem yu no save deletim o jenisim. Lukluk long konten blong yu daonbilo.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Olgeta konten blong yu long grup ia bambae i kam anonim mo i stap long aekaev long 7 dei, afta long hem yu no save deletim o jenisim. Lukluk long konten blong yu daonbilo.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Klik long link blong komuniti daonbilo, login olsem admin mo jusum Fraud management long meniu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Namba blong posibol frod aktiviti wetem estimet 75% janis blong frod
email.possibleFraudInformation: Sistem blong mifala we i otomatik i bin aedentifae posibol frod aktiviti. Yu save lukluk klosap tru long Community admin interface. Sam long aktiviti ia i gat non frod risen so yu mas keaful blong investiget gud bifo yu deletim konten.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Konten ia i bin otomatikali flag olsem toxic usum AI algorithms we i estimetem toxicity blong konten. Yu save deletim konten sapos i nidim.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Wan AI algorithm i otomatikali flag visuel imajri we i konek wetem konten ia. Dis algorithm i reviu imajis blong posibol adalt, vaolent, medical, mo racy imajri. Yu save deletim konten sapos i nidim.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Sapos AI algorithm i kalkuletem wan sko we i rong, long taem ya yu no nid blong wari, yu no nid blong tekem eni aksen mo yu save ignorim email ya.
email.automaticToxicityHowLikely: Hamas persen (%) blong i kam posen
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Inglis text we oli yusum blong sko
